articles.title: Indian Girl Students Out Of Kharkiv With Russian Help, Boys Next: Sources - NDTV
articles.description: Girl students waiting to leave Kharkiv are on their way to Ukraine's western border by train and efforts are being made to evacuate the boys, government sources told NDTV today. Kharkiv, sources said, is now virtually under Russian control.
articles.content:
"We are tying up with Russians for the safe passage of our students," an official said.
